The bill also ensures that funds go to modernizing these confidential state-run Immunization Information Systems and not unrelated activities, such as enforcing federal vaccine mandates.

This bill simply enhances the security of these existing state systems by mandating that immunization data is confidential. It would provide an extra layer of protection to our healthcare information and make the information easily transferable between states.

I‚Äôd like to clear up some misconceptions surrounding H.R. 550. This bill doesn‚Äôt have anything to do with vaccine mandates. It does not create a federal database. It does not create a personal tracking system. Immunization databases already exist. They‚Äôre just outdated.
